Blog.post: Favorite time in middle school would have to be the dc trip. The disections that grossed my lab partner(ashely sroka) out was unforgetable. The idiots were awsome. favorite time durin these two years where great...especaily the GRAVITY GAMES!!! awsome . i had a few girl friends...most turned out to be a mistake...all but one. il miss all of you guys back in parma a lot...i might have friends here but you guys were true friends. -pat

a lota stuff happened these last two years. good, bad, tom . theres no way i could thank everyone who helped me along the way. Jake, your like a brother to me, i probably wouldnt have had so much fun with out you. Jt, you owe me your life, but when i look back at the times i saved you, im glad i did. Ashely (C) , good times bad times, even though we hated each other at times, we still became pretty good friends. other Ashely (S) damn bad times, but most of the time we were friends. If i didnt type about you, dont worry, im not done. -pat

1. Dont take life too seriously, youll never get out alive - Van Wilder 2. Girls dont like boys girls like cars and money - Good Charelet 3. First dates are interviews -Van Wilder 4. I dont want to be told to grow up - Simple plan 5. You can tell alot about someone by the kind of underwear they wear -Van Wilder 6. The rich and the famous, theyre always complainin' - Good Charelet 7. Are you stalking me (only said to hot girls that you like) cuz' that would be super -Van Wilder 8. Work sucks -Blink182 9. Doesnt she have a boyfriend? Details. Van Wilder 10. God must hate me -Simple plan 11. Worrying is like a rocking chair, it gives you something to do but it doesnt get you anywhere -Van wilder lots more on the way

OK since this site doesnt have a guest book, just comment on this. To post a comment, under this post, it says comments...click that then under other peoples comment it says post a comment...click that...then its all yours -pat

Comedy- Van Wilder , The Run Down , Bullet Proof , 50 First Dates , and I Spy Action- Lord Of The Rings , Matrix , Bulletproof Monk , Behind Enemy Lines , and Star Wars Thriller- Final Destanation , Secret Window , and Final Destanation 2 Chick Flicks- hahahahaha - thats it...for now -pat

these are all songs that i can relate to: by linkin park: crawling, numb, run away, forgotten, my december, somewhere i belong, eiser to run, breaking the habit, nobodys listening, and one step closer by good charlotte: the anthem, life styles of the rich and the famous, girls and boys, and the day that i die by simple plan: perfect, god must hate me, andid do anything by the ataris: so long astoria, ill never spend another night alone, and radio #2 tons more on the way

Every time i punk someone from now on, i will post it. Heres the kick off for the summer. Title: Fake love- This girl i met a few days ago starts acting like she like me. I start laughincuz i no its a joke. I go along and team up with Mark. Mark was instructing her on wut to say and together we made he whole thing back fire. It was awsome. At first she was really mad about the backfire till i reminded her: she did the same thing. Fake outs: name-lisa real name- Jenny home state- texas real state- ohio great time

-not-these aren't in any order. 1. Id do anything 2. Faint 3. Party like a rock star 4. The anthem 5. God must hate me 6. Perfect 7. One step closer 8. In the end 9. Somewhere i belong 10.Grow up 11. Bouncin of the walls 12. Stuck in america 13. My christmas list 14. Swing swing 15. Girl all the bad guys want -pat
